attributes.action: Prevent legislation going through to make MP's and Peers excempt from the Freedom of Informaiton Act in order to hide Expenses etc
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Prevent Tory MP David MacLean making MP's and Peers excempt from the Freedom of Information laws so that their ridiculous expense claims cannot be exposed in future.  They should adhere to the law as much as the next person

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
